title: What Made Double Agent Kim Philby A Great Spy? His Friends.
teaser: Philby was one of the 20th century's most legendary spies. NPR's Arun Rath talks with author Ben Macintyre about his new book, A Spy Among Friends, and the boozy secret to Philby's success.
